com.communote.server.core.common.ldap

Class LdapUserAttributesMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.common.ldap.LdapAttributesMapper<ExternalUserVO>
      • com.communote.server.core.common.ldap.LdapUserAttributesMapper

  • public class LdapUserAttributesMapper
extends LdapAttributesMapper<ExternalUserVO>
    Mapper for mapping LDAP user attributes to an ExternalUserVO.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
